subject: Veterinary Medicine
Horse Racing
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Dr. Gilman’s procedure for examining thoroughbred racehorses in New York became standard at racetracks around the country, improving safety for horses and jockeys.
snippet: Dr. Gilman’s procedure for examining thoroughbred racehorses in New York became standard at racetracks around the country, improving safety for horses and jockeys.
